member.name: T:Converters.BooleanToObjectConverter
member.summary: Converter from a boolean or nullable boolean to the first or second object of a collection.

member.name: M:Converters.BooleanToObjectConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converter from a boolean or nullable boolean to the first or second object of a collection.
member.param: The value produced by the binding source.
The type of the binding target property.
The converter parameter to use.
The culture to use in the converter.
member.returns: If is a collection with at least three objects, and is null, returns the 3rd item. Otherwise, If is a bool and equal to True, or a bool? and also equal to true, and is a collection with at least two objects, the converter returns the second object in the collection. Otherwise, if the collection has at least two objects, the converter returns the first object in the collection. Otherwise, this method throws an exception.

member.name: M:Converters.BooleanToObjectConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Converter from a boolean or nullable boolean to the first or second object of a collection.
member.param: The value produced by the binding source.
The converter parameter to use.
member.returns: If is a collection with at least three objects, and is null, returns the 3rd item. Otherwise, If is a bool and equal to True, or a bool? and also equal to true, and is a collection with at least two objects, the converter returns the second object in the collection. Otherwise, if the collection has at least two objects, the converter returns the first object in the collection. Otherwise, this method throws an exception.

member.name: M:Converters.BooleanToObjectConverter.ConvertBack(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts an object to a instance in a binding.
member.param: The value that is produced by the binding target.
The type to convert to.
The converter parameter to use.
The culture to use in the converter.

member.name: T:Converters.NullToObjectConverter
member.summary: Converter from a reference to the first or second object of a collection.

member.name: M:Converters.NullToObjectConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converter from a reference to the first or second object of a collection.
member.param: The value produced by the binding source.
The type of the binding target property.
The converter parameter to use.
The culture to use in the converter.
member.returns: If is non-null reference, and is a collection with at least two objects, the converter returns the second object in the collection. Otherwise, if collection has at least two objects, the converter returns the first object in the collection. Otherwise, this method throws an exception.

member.name: T:Converters.ZeroToObjectConverter
member.summary: Converter from an int (or convertible) or nullable int to the first or second object of a collection.

member.summary: Converter from an int (or convertible) or nullable int to the first or second object of a collection.
member.param: The value produced by the binding source.
The type of the binding target property.
The converter parameter to use.
The culture to use in the converter.
member.returns: If is a collection with at least three objects, and is null, returns the 3rd item. Otherwise, If is an int (or convertible) and non-zero, or an int? and also non-zero, and is a collection with at least two objects, the converter returns the second object in the collection. Otherwise, if the collection has at least two objects, the converter returns the first object in the collection. Otherwise, this method throws an exception.

Otherwise, if the collection has at least two objects, the converter returns the first object in the collection. Otherwise, this method throws an exception.
